verses.verse: And God <WH430> remembered <WH2142> <WH853> Noah, <WH5146> and every <WH3605> living thing, <WH2416> and all <WH3605> the cattle <WH929> that <WH834> was with <WH854> him in the ark: <WH8392> and God <WH430> made a wind <WH7307> to pass <WH5674> over <WH5921> the earth, <WH776> and the waters <WH4325> assuaged; <WH7918>
The fountains <WH4599> also of the deep <WH8415> and the windows <WH699> of heaven <WH8064> were stopped, <WH5534> and the rain <WH1653> from <WH4480> heaven <WH8064> was restrained; <WH3607>

And the waters <WH4325> returned <WH7725> from off <WH4480> <WH5921> the earth <WH776> continually: <WH1980> <WH7725> and after the end <WH4480> <WH7097> of the hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> days <WH3117> the waters <WH4325> were abated. <WH2637>

And the ark <WH8392> rested <WH5117> in the seventh <WH7637> month, <WH2320> on the seventeenth <WH7651> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the month, <WH2320> upon <WH5921> the mountains <WH2022> of Ararat. <WH780>

And the waters <WH4325> decreased <WH2637> continually <WH1961> <WH1980> until <WH5704> the tenth <WH6224> month: <WH2320> in the tenth <WH6224> month, on the first <WH259> day of the month, <WH2320> were the tops <WH7218> of the mountains <WH2022> seen. <WH7200>

And it came to pass <WH1961> at the end <WH4480> <WH7093> of forty <WH705> days, <WH3117> that Noah <WH5146> opened <WH6605> <WH853> the window <WH2474> of the ark <WH8392> which <WH834> he had made: <WH6213>

And he sent forth <WH7971> <WH853> a raven, <WH6158> which went forth <WH3318> to and fro, <WH3318> <WH7725> until <WH5704> the waters <WH4325> were dried up <WH3001> from off <WH4480> <WH5921> the earth. <WH776>

Also he sent forth <WH7971> <WH853> a dove <WH3123> from <WH4480> <WH854> him, to see <WH7200> if the waters <WH4325> were abated <WH7043> from off <WH4480> <WH5921> the face <WH6440> of the ground; <WH127>

But the dove <WH3123> found <WH4672> no <WH3808> rest <WH4494> for the sole <WH3709> of her foot, <WH7272> and she returned <WH7725> unto <WH413> him into <WH413> the ark, <WH8392> for <WH3588> the waters <WH4325> were on <WH5921> the face <WH6440> of the whole <WH3605> earth: <WH776> then he put forth <WH7971> his hand, <WH3027> and took <WH3947> her, and pulled her in <WH935> <WH853> unto <WH413> him into <WH413> the ark. <WH8392>
And he stayed <WH2342> yet <WH5750> other <WH312> seven <WH7651> days; <WH3117> and again <WH3254> he sent forth <WH7971> <WH853> the dove <WH3123> out of <WH4480> the ark; <WH8392>

And the dove <WH3123> came in <WH935> to <WH413> him in <WH6256> the evening; <WH6153> and, lo, <WH2009> in her mouth <WH6310> was an olive <WH2132> leaf <WH5929> plucked off: <WH2965> so Noah <WH5146> knew <WH3045> that <WH3588> the waters <WH4325> were abated <WH7043> from off <WH4480> <WH5921> the earth. <WH776>

And he stayed <WH3176> yet <WH5750> other <WH312> seven <WH7651> days; <WH3117> and sent forth <WH7971> <WH853> the dove; <WH3123> which returned <WH7725> not <WH3808> again <WH3254> unto <WH413> him any more. <WH5750>

And it came to pass <WH1961> in the six <WH8337> hundredth <WH3967> and first <WH259> year, <WH8141> in the first <WH7223> month, the first <WH259> day of the month, <WH2320> the waters <WH4325> were dried up <WH2717> from off <WH4480> <WH5921> the earth: <WH776> and Noah <WH5146> removed <WH5493> <WH853> the covering <WH4372> of the ark, <WH8392> and looked, <WH7200> and, behold, <WH2009> the face <WH6440> of the ground <WH127> was dry. <WH2717>
And in the second <WH8145> month, <WH2320> on the seven <WH7651> and twentieth <WH6242> day <WH3117> of the month, <WH2320> was the earth <WH776> dried. <WH3001>
And God <WH430> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Noah, <WH5146> saying, <WH559>
Go forth <WH3318> of <WH4480> the ark, <WH8392> thou, <WH859> and thy wife, <WH802> and thy sons, <WH1121> and thy sons' <WH1121> wives <WH802> with <WH854> thee.

Bring forth <WH3318> with <WH854> thee every <WH3605> living thing <WH2416> that <WH834> is with <WH854> thee, of all <WH4480> <WH3605> flesh, <WH1320> both of fowl, <WH5775> and of cattle, <WH929> and of every <WH3605> creeping thing <WH7431> that creepeth <WH7430> upon <WH5921> the earth; <WH776> that they may breed abundantly <WH8317> in the earth, <WH776> and be fruitful, <WH6509> and multiply <WH7235> upon <WH5921> the earth. <WH776>
And Noah <WH5146> went forth, <WH3318> and his sons, <WH1121> and his wife, <WH802> and his sons' <WH1121> wives <WH802> with <WH854> him:

Every <WH3605> beast, <WH2416> every <WH3605> creeping thing, <WH7431> and every <WH3605> fowl, <WH5775> and whatsoever <WH3605> creepeth <WH7430> upon <WH5921> the earth, <WH776> after their kinds, <WH4940> went forth <WH3318> out of <WH4480> the ark. <WH8392>

And Noah <WH5146> built <WH1129> an altar <WH4196> unto the LORD; <WH3068> and took <WH3947> of every <WH4480> <WH3605> clean <WH2889> beast, <WH929> and of every <WH4480> <WH3605> clean <WH2889> fowl, <WH5775> and offered <WH5927> burnt offerings <WH5930> on the altar. <WH4196>

And the LORD <WH3068> smelled <WH7306> a sweet <WH5207> <WH853> savor; <WH7381> and the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> in <WH413> his heart, <WH3820> I will not <WH3808> again <WH3254> curse <WH7043> <WH853> the ground <WH127> any more <WH5750> for man's sake; <WH5668> <WH120> for <WH3588> the imagination <WH3336> of man's <WH120> heart <WH3820> is evil <WH7451> from his youth; <WH4480> <WH5271> neither <WH3808> will I again <WH3254> smite <WH5221> any more <WH5750> <WH853> every thing <WH3605> living, <WH2416> as <WH834> I have done. <WH6213>

While <WH5750> the earth <WH776> remaineth, <WH3605> <WH3117> seedtime <WH2233> and harvest, <WH7105> and cold <WH7120> and heat, <WH2527> and summer <WH7019> and winter, <WH2779> and day <WH3117> and night <WH3915> shall not <WH3808> cease. <WH7673>
